english.segment1: When it gets me back again. I'll be ready to begin. Ready to stand up to it. And it gets me back again
english.segment2: (Chorus). On my word I could never see it coming. Cause I never could keep up on. Anyone. You said you could. But you wouldn't. Tell me what to do. And I never could see through you. Even sometimes
english.segment3: On better days. You and I. Will figure this out. Push it down. Look behind
english.segment4: When it gets me back again. I'll be reeady to begin. Ready to stqand up to it. And it gets mee back again
